content: सपक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Winged, having wings. {@--2@} Having a side or party. {@--3@} Belonging to the same side or party. {@--4@} (Hence) Kindred, like, similar (<ab>fig.</ab>); दलद्द्राक्षातिर्यद्रसर्भरसपक्षा भणितयः <ls>Bv. 2. 77.</ls> {@--5@} Containing the पक्ष or subject of an inference. --क्षः {@--1@} An adherent, a follower, partisan. {@--2@} A kindred, a kinsman; परित्रातस्त्वया सपक्षः <ls>M. 4.</ls> {@--3@} (In logic) An instance on the same side, a similar instance; निश्चितसाध्यवान् सपक्षः <ls>T. S.</ls>
